name: Free Notion Landing Page Template
description: I'm a big fan of Notion, and so is everyone. I have been searching for a ready-to-use notion template for building the landing page of my product, but I couldn't find one. So, I made one for myself and thought I should share it with the world, for free. Just write 0 in the price box, or whatever amount you want and the template is yours to duplicate and reuse (but NOT REDISTRIBUTE).Content:1. Hero Component2. CTA3. Features4. Testimonials5. FooterBy providing your email address, you agree to rec
